page.title: 19NEWS ABOUT WIMBORNE.
page.content:
Here are some news items from the Wimborne and Ferndown Western Gazette (14th June,1985.).
1. Wimborne's Folk Festival was said to be the best so far by,its organisers and the townspeople. 2. The annual awards evening of Wimborne Cine Club was held in the Quarterjack Suite at the Allendale Community Centre. 3. The Allenbourne Middle School, Wimborne, had a fete on Saturday which raised Â£1,456 for school equipment. 4. 39 rafts took part in a five mile event on the River Stour in Wimborne. 5. A Happiness Hamper containing home- made cakes and scones with jam and clotted cream, and potted plants for the wards was presented to Wimborne Victoria Hospital by the Women's Instittute Market. P.ELVIDGE (TEACHER)
